DOC.brief_summary: aimed at investigating the efficacy, safety, and clinical outcome of Medium-Calorie or standard-calorie total parenteral nutrition (TPN) for patients with gastrointestinal cancer undergoing surgery
DOC.brief_title: Medium Calorie Parenteral Nutrition on Patients With Gastrointestinal Cancer Undergoing Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: biochemistry data Various inflammation-related cytokines clinical outcome hospital stay
DOC.criteria: Patients considered for major surgery for colorectal cancer Expected requirement for post operative PN or TPN of at least for 7 days Age >18 Hemodynamically stable Written Informed Consent Hemodynamic failure of any organ Renal insufficiency Patients with severe liver dysfunction Albumin < 3g/dL DM with poor blood sugar control
